messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Hello SS13, We send you over one of our interns for some work experience before the real deal, treat him nicely ok? He's just here to make sure you all have burgers and beer.

Thanks, Steve from accounting

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of energy draining parasites have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have detected a massive gravitational singularity and we are fast tracking your shuttle.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Janitorial Division

Cargo: One of our freighters carrying a bee shipment has been attacked by eco-terrorists. Can you clean up the mess for us?
